about.bioParagraph1: I am an Electrical-Electronics Engineer who believes that software is the most powerful tool for solving modern engineering challenges. My background isn't just limited to code; I am passionate about metalworking, welding, and 3D printing.
about.bioParagraph2: From developing real-time Facial Recognition systems on Raspberry Pi to optimizing Machine Learning models like LightGBM, I focus on building practical, data-driven solutions.

projects.subtitle: Engineered Solutions & Interactive Experiences
projects.hangmanDesc: Classic hangman game implemented with vanilla JS and CSS animations. Contains responsive layout, keyboard support, and simple state management for rounds and scoring.
projects.todolistDesc: Lightweight todo app using Local Storage for persistence, optimistic UI updates and accessible form controls. Includes filtering, sorting and small animations for better UX.
projects.examDesc: A validation-first exam interface with real-time answer checking, localized strings, keyboard navigation and progress persistence. Focused on minimal latency and clear feedback for users.
projects.flightTrackerDesc: Built with React and Leaflet to display live flight positions, custom clustered markers and performant map interactions. Includes API retry/caching, accessibility labels for map controls and mobile-friendly gestures.
